title: Day 0: Katie Couric previews the Opening Ceremony
description: Opening Ceremony co-host Katie Couric discusses what to expect from the broadcast (8:30 ET, NBC), the unified team of North and South Korea, and her interview with figure skating star Nathan Chen. We'll also take a look back at some pivotal moments in Olympic history, and at how the Winter Games have evolved from 1924 to today.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Sports)
